content: Philidor was considered the best chess player in the world in his time. The Philidor Defense, which is one of the open games, is named after him.
translations: ita:Philidor era considerato il miglior giocatore di scacchi del mondo ai suoi tempi. Il Philidor Defense, che Ã¨ uno dei gio
